titleStmt.title: A regular and easie table of natural contractions by the persons, moods, and tenses; each character made from the alphabet, & vowels places, the like never done by any other hand. / Composed by Wm. Mason writing mr.
titleStmt.author: Mason, William, fl. 1672-1709.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
